author: Jamie Anderson
title: Chelsea v Manchester United LIVE: Follow all the build up to the FA Cup quarter-final | Football | Sport | Express.co.uk
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Chelsea 0-0 Man United LIVE: Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte clash on the sidelines EXPRESS SPORT brings you live coverage of tonight's FA Cup quarter-finals between Chelsea and Manchester United - follow it here. PUBLISHED: 19:30, Mon, Mar 13, 2017 | UPDATED: 20:37, Mon, Mar 13, 2017 Chelsea host Manchester United in the FA Cup quarter-finals The winner will join Manchester City , Arsenal and Tottenham in the last four Jose Mourinho has a striker crisis but Antonio Conte has a full team to pick from
